name: Free The Burden
description:
IMPORTANT

If you are playing in Web Browser Make Sure To Play in Fullscreen

Welcome To Free The Burden!

As a new student counselor at Water Crossing High, you start consoling students and you start to have an emotional burden weighing you down and you have to collect all the 4 pieces of the Magic Wisdom Scroll that will free you from your burden. Though you have to be careful because after a while the burden will weigh you down causing you to move slower and not jump as high.  Good Luck!

Use WASD or arrow keys to move.

Left Click - Shoot

PS. Use the Browser version if you want everything to scale better. Also sorry if it is bad this is my first time using unity. Also all constructive criticism is welcome! I hope you enjoy!

New Devlog on Youtube coming on Saturday!

Channel Link:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjP6jgf6rMu231TSdePXTwg
